home_page.title: Qubic Network Decisions with <bold>Computor Voting</bold>
home_page.description: The Qubic computor voting is used to reach a consensus on topics to be decided regarding the entire network. This can include accepting smart contracts or making other protocol decisions. Only computors are allowed to participate.
